channel.title: Comments on: Nintendo Customer Adventure Island

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description: All true. Lots of folks at Amazon in Seattle have gone to the Nintendo CS center or store in Redmond to pick up controllers and nunchucks, cables, and other stuff for their Wiis.
item.content:encoded: All true. Lots of folks at Amazon in Seattle have gone to the Nintendo CS center or store in Redmond to pick up controllers and nunchucks, cables, and other stuff for their Wiis.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: That's just freakin' awesome. I wish more companies had such wonderful customer service.
item.content:encoded: That’s just freakin’ awesome. I wish more companies had such wonderful customer service.
